name: Dark Transparency -Customisable- Google Classroom
description: Based off the Dark Fusion theme for Google. With this theme you are able to change the background, banner and colour of all classrooms for you. Great for when the teacher pick a not-so-cool picture or ugly colour.
additional_info:
v1.2.3 - Bug fixes

v1.2.2 - White on white error with text and names now fixed. 

v1.2.1 - Bugs fixed (Pages not displaying backgrounds)

v1.2 - Added customization for main classroom colour.

v1.1 - Added customization for images.

v1.0 - Public release
       Customization coming soon...
